name: Tic Tac Toe - Connecting Threes Square in a Row
name_original: Tic Tac Toe - Connecting Threes Square in a Row
description:
Tic tac toe is a addictive game for two players, X and O(two humans or human and computer), who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.

Support 3 modes:
- One player mode: includes 3 difficulty levels, easy,medium and hard
- Two player mode: you can play against your friends
- Five row mode: who first get an unbroken 5 dots in 15*15 grid wins the game
